Default: Could you help clean the table and floor? You can come back to meet me after you finish.
en: Could you help clean the table and floor? You can come back to meet me after you finish.
zh-Hans: 你可唔可以幫手抹下張?同埋清潔地板呀？做?之後可以翻?搵我呀。
zh-HK: 你可不可以幫忙抹一下餐桌然後清潔一下地板呀？做完之後可以回來找我呀。

Default: Let help mom prepare the sandwich breakfast!
en: Let help mom prepare the sandwich breakfast!
zh-Hans: 讓我們幫媽媽完成三明治吧！
zh-HK: 讓我們幫媽媽完成三明治吧！

zh-Hans: 做得非常好！唔該曬你幫我手呀。
zh-HK: 做得非常好！謝謝你幫我忙呀。
